thread.title: S.W.P.
thread.title_full: Olive Oil Lovers reviewed by S.W.P.

author: S.W.P.
title: S.W.P.
text: I recently made an order of various olive oils and vinegars. I found the salesperson to be personable, knowledgeable and spot-on with the estimate of delivery timing. The products have been excellent and the order was packed very, very well to eliminate possibility of breakage. Because their oils and unusual vinegars are not readily available at local stores and markets, and the quality is so high, I'm sure I will be ordering from them again.
